explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a multiple classifier fusion based risk assessment algorithm, which is a machine learning approach.
explanations.supervised learning: The method uses labeled data (training dataset of 185 enterprises) to train the classifiers, which is a supervised learning approach.
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on classifying the risk levels of enterprise M&A, which is a classification problem.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper uses six support vector machines (SVMs) as classifiers in the proposed algorithm.
explanations.SVM: The paper uses six support vector machines (SVMs) as classifiers in the proposed algorithm.
